entry.title: the CDS of APP Monitor Value Chains
entry.content:
Hi,

As I use the 5D2 scope item , the APP Monitor Value Chains is very useful , I can see the relationship of all the document .

But in the APP Monitor Value Chains , I have to one by one to check the relationship.

I want to do a report , so can you tell me the CDS of APP Monitor Value Chains ?

entry.title: Automating the Import of ISO 20022 Customer Payment Status Report Files In S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD: Is T
entry.content:
Hi everyone,
I am looking to automate the process of importing ISO 20022 Customer Payment Status Report files into our SAP S4Hana CLOUD system. I was wondering if there is a specific API or an integrated solution that SAP offers to efficiently handle these files.

Does anyone have experience with this type of automation? Any suggestions on how to configure or implement such a solution?

Thank you in advance for your support!

entry.title: Clarification Required on Cleared Amounts in Aging Report
entry.content:
I am working on a custom aging report using the CDS view I_OperationalAcctgDocCube. In the current setup, I am able to retrieve the Clearing Date and Clearing Journal Entry correctly. However, I am facing the following challenges and would appreciate your guidance:

  1. Cleared Amount in Report
    • I want to display the cleared amount (e.g., amount posted in Document Type KZ â€“ Vendor Payment) along with clearing details.
    • Please confirm if this field can be derived directly from I_OperationalAcctgDocCube, or if an association with another CDS view (such as I_JournalEntryItem) is required.
  2. Advance Payments
    • Advance payments also use Document Type KZ.
    • How can I differentiate advance payments from normal vendor payments in the report?
    • Is filtering by Special G/L Indicator (A) or another field recommended in Public Cloud?
  3. Duplicate

entry.title: Unable to update Journal Entry Line with KOART value "D"
entry.content:
In S/4 HANA Public Cloud, I'm trying to update the field Reference1byBusinessPartner using I_JournalEntryTP - Change but it keeps on failed return message "To be changed journal entry item could not be found".

I found that it only allows BSEG line with KOART values - S/A/M. The line that I'm trying to update has KOART value of D.

Is there any way for me to update the Journal Entry line item with KOART value of D?

entry.content:
Hi Team,

I am not a able to create new BKPF object in t code OAC3. Getting error as "Entry BKPF does not exist in TOJTB" . BKPF exists in the TOJTB table , attached screenshot is for reference.

entry.title: Archiving Custom Database Tables in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I'm currently working on a data archiving in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I have a few Questions about the Archiving of Custom Database tables.

For SAP standard tables, the process is well-defined and handled via the Information Lifecycle Management (ILM) framework, using standard ILM and archiving objects.

My challenge is with custom-developed database tables. I want to archive data from these tables, but I'm struggling to get the ILM framework to recognize my custom setup.

Here's what I've done so far:

  • I created a custom ILM Object and a corresponding Archiving Object for my custom DB table.

  • However, when I try to configure this ILM Object in the relevant ILM settings, I cannot assign the custom ILM Object to an Audit Area.

This leads to my main questions:

Is the ILM Framework fully supported and suitable for custom-developed tables and data archiving in SAP Public Cloud?

If yes, where can i configure the missing settings, so that the ILM Framework recognizes my ILM Object?

If ILM is not the recommended path for custom tables, what are the alternatives for archiving?

I'm considering the use of the Document Management Service (DMS) 

  1. Is DMS a viable storage for archived structured data?

  2. If so, would the data need to be converted into a specific document format (like XML or JSON) before being stored.

  3. Are there any best practices or recommended services/APIs in the Public Cloud specifically designed for archiving custom, structured business data outside of the standard ILM flow?

Any insights from someone who has successfully implemented archiving for custom solutions in the SAP Public Cloud would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Updating a custom field of std app with a custom app field that is created by dev extensibility
entry.content:
Hi,

I have a custom app that is created by Developer Extensibility in Eclipse.

I also have a custom field in std app of s4hana cloud that is created by using In-App Extensibility.

When new record is created(saved) in custom app,

I would like to update the value of  that custom app field to a custom field of std app.

Is it possible to do so?

If yes, could you please share how we can do it?

 

Thank You. 

Best Regards,

Aye Chan

entry.title: Can call Custom Business Object deployed from Eclipse CDS view from Customizing Tenant
entry.content:
Hello Community,

We created a custom Business Object (BO) in Eclipse (ABAP project) and deployed it to the Development tenant (080).
However, the BAdI implementation can only be done in the Customizing tenant (100).
In the Customizing tenant, we are unable to call either the CDS view or the outbound service of the custom BO.

Is there any alternative way to access the CDS view or outbound service of the custom BO from the Customizing tenant?
If yes, please share your experience.

entry.title: Connect SAP Business Application Studio (SAP BAS) and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition - error 403
entry.content:
Hello everyone in the community.

I would like to mention that I want to recreate the example from the following blog: Work with SAPUI5 Adaptation Projects to Make Changes and Extend the Source Code of an Application Variant of an SAP Fiori Application in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

I have a connection to SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition with a Test/100 Tenant, and I followed the steps indicated in the following blog: Connect SAP Business Application Studio (SAP BAS) and SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment, but with several adjustments. On the other hand, I also relied on this note (2685335 - SAP Web IDE Integration with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition) to successfully create the destination.

Basically, the note indicates the following steps:

  1. Maintain platform subaccounts and SAP Web IDE permissions (I omitted this step/blog).
  2. Set up trust between identity authentication and SAP Cloud Platform subaccount (I omitted this step/blog).
  3. Create OAuth communication system and user (I executed this).
  4. Enable SAP Web IDE for S/4HANA system via OAuth (I executed this).

In summary, from my SAP BTP account, I managed to list all the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition applications, but when I select the Manage Credit Accounts application, it shows the following error: "Fetching base application inbounds failed: Request failed with status code 403".

I've attached a screenshot.

In my case, I have already assigned the developer roles, extensibility roles, and the roles to access Manage Credit Accounts, and I even created the permissions from the Communication Arrangements.

Screenshots of assigned roles

Screenshots of Communication Arrangements

Screenshots of Inbound/Outbound Users

Screenshot of the destination

Now, I would like to know what I am doing wrong and why I am getting the error: "Fetching base application inbounds failed: Request failed with status code 403"?. Another thing I would like to know is: what is the replacement for SAP_COM_0013 since it is obsolete?.However, I found that the 3-System Landscapes in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition has three tenants: Development system, Test system, and Production system. But I am connecting to the Test System Tenant, and apparently, from that instance, it is not possible to perform the Adaptation Project (Developer Extensibility), although it is possible to use "Adapt UI" and even use "Key User Extensibility", according to the following documentation.

I am even attaching a screenshot stating that to use Developer Extensibility (Adaptation Project), it is necessary to be in the Development System Tenant.

However, the company's architecture does not have two tenants; they do everything from the (Test/Dev - Prd) Tenant. So, could you please guide me on what I should do or how to proceed to overcome the error, or is it simply that due to the Tenant I have access to, it is not possible to create the Adaptation Project?

Thank you very much in advance.

entry.title: SAP Fiori UI5 Personalization Engine event attachStateChange not firing
entry.content:
I'm trying to add a column selection in view settings for sap.m.table

i have the code below where i try to attach the Engine event so when column selected changed, the function is not firing.

All i'm getting is this error - "Log-dbg.js:497 2025-12-09 17:19:39.498800 A Change was not created successfully. Reason: - No Change handler registered for the Control and Change type"

May I know what am I missing?

onInit: function () {
   this.oMetadataHelperPrint = new MetadataHelper(aColumns);

   Engine.getInstance().register(oTable, {
      helper: this.oMetadataHelperPrint,
        controller: {
          Columns: new SelectionController({
             targetAggregation: "columns",
             control: oTable,
             persistenceIdentifier: "selection-columns"
          })
        }
  });

  Engine.getInstance().attachStateChange(this.handleStateChange, this);
},

handleStateChange: function (oEvt) {
  //logic placed here
}

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud - CDS Views Equivalent to On-Premise Tables for Sales Reconciliation Solution
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,
We are migrating an existing sales reconciliation solution from on-premise S/4HANA to S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition. We need to identify the equivalent CDS views for the following on-premise tables used in our reconciliation logic.
Please provide the specific CDS view name for each table. If key fields are known (especially for transactional data that requires joins), please include them as well.

Question 1: KNB1 (Customer Master - Company Code Data)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Question 2: BSID (AR Open Items - Customer)
Equivalent CDS view name?
Key fields for joining with other CDS views?

Question 3: BKPF (Accounting Document Header)
Equivalent CDS view name?
Key fields for joining with other CDS views?

Question 4: VBRK (Billing Document Header)
Equivalent CDS view name?
Key fields for joining with other CDS views?

Question 5: VBRP (Billing Document Item)
Equivalent CDS view name?
Key fields for joining with other CDS views?

Question 6: VBAP (Sales Order Item)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Question 7: VBPA (Sales Order Partner)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Question 8: VBAK (Sales Order Header)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Question 9: VBKD (Sales Order Business Data)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Note: We would appreciate responses in the same numbered order (1â†’9) to keep the discussion clear.
Thank you in advance!

entry.title: Output Management - How to send emails to mail-addresses from BUR001 relationship
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

in our scenario we have integrated S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition with Sales Cloud V2. As stated in that KBA, V2 is not able to display the email-address of the business partner in the UI. To see and use the email addresses in V2, they have to be replicated via the relationships. Therefore we would have to maintain it on relationship-level in S/4.

The challenge we're facing is: In S/4 we need the email address on Business Partner level for the use in Output Management (we're using Y partner functions to send emails to the Contact Persons). 

To summarize: In V2 we need the mail addresses in another place than in S/4...

Has anyone an idea, if we could use a CDS-View in S/4 to use the mail-address from the relationship in Output Management? I know there's a BAdI APOC_ADD_EMAIL_RECIPIENTS which might help.

BR Tobi

entry.title: SAP PUBLIC CLOUD EVENT - Billing Document Created
entry.content:

in SAP S4HANA Public Cloud we need to create an Automatic Header Text in the Billing Customer Invoice after creation.

I can use this event in SAP S4Hana Public Cloud? I need specific license? What i've to activate in the system? 

Is not an integration, but when user creates sales invoice, i need event to call API_BillingDocument for create text in the sales invoice created.

entry.title: MODIFY ENTITY FOR CREATE I_SALESORDERTP throws dump in batch job
entry.content: We have created custom class in ADT to create manufacturing sales order through EML statement and it successfully creates sales order when I execute the class through ABAP application console. But if the same class is scheduled as job through job template it throws runtime error RAISE_SHORTDUMP in program CX_SADL_SHORTDUMP stating reason Content ID reference 'H001' misses preceding content ID. Please note that the job was successful for MODIFY entities with single value but throws this dump for Modify entities with table as we have to create sales order with multiple lines. Could you please provide suggestions to resolve this issue

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud â€“ Dunning Notice Email to Customer + Multiple Contact Persons from BP Maste
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

We are using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3SL) and are trying to configure Dunning Notice emails so that email IDs are picked dynamically from BP master data, without hardcoding email addresses.

Requirement

When a dunning run is executed:

Email should be sent to the Customer BP email

Email should also be sent to all linked Contact Personsâ€™ email IDs

Multiple Contact Persons should receive the email automatically

All email IDs must be derived only from BP master (Customer + Contact Person)

What we have already configured

  1. BP Master

Customer BP has email maintained in Address â†’ Communication

Contact Person BPs have email maintained

Relationships maintained: Has Contact Person, Has Dunning Recipient

  1. Output Parameter Determination â€“ Receiver

Application: Dunning

Determination Step: Receiver

Decision Table: DT_RECEIVER

Entry maintained:

Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE

Account Type = D (Customer) Role = D Exclusive Indicator = false

Note: We do not see CP (Contact Person) as a selectable Role in Receiver.

  1. Output Parameter Determination â€“ Email Recipient

Determination Step: Email Recipient

Decision Table: DT_EMAIL_RECEIVER

Entries maintained:

Row 1: Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE,  Email Type = TO, Email Address = Context â†’ Customer â†’ Email Address

Row 2: Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE, Email Type = TO Email Address = Context â†’ Contact Person â†’ Email Address

 

Issue / Clarification Required

CP (Contact Person) does not appear as a Role in Receiver determination

It is unclear whether Contact Persons are implicitly derived during Email Recipient determination

Despite maintaining BP relationships and Email Recipient context mapping, the behavior is not clearly documented

Questions

  1. In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, is it standard behavior that Contact Persons are not selectable in the Receiver Role?
  2. Is the above configuration sufficient for sending dunning emails to:
    1. Customer BP email, and
    2. All Contact Person emails marked as Dunning Recipient?
  3. Is there any additional configuration or prerequisite required for Contact Person email determination?
  4. Is there any SAP documentation or note confirming this behavior?

entry.title: Luxembourg eCDF - Generate Financial Statement (RPFILU_AFS)
entry.content:
Hello, 

when I generate eCDF XML file in the Generate Financial Statement - Luxembourg (RPFILU_AFS), the values for <Agent> and <Declarer> section are the default ones provided by SAP. 

How can they be changed? Please note that I did the configuration in the SSCUI 101071 Setting Up Your Statutory Reporting in CBC where I defined the LU_EVATECDF_DECL_... and LU_EVATECDF_SEND_... attributes. But unfortunately it only displays in VAT reports via Run statutory Reports app, but not in RPFILU_AFS. 

Where can I maintain the Electronic Financial Data Collection Platform parameters? 

Many thanks

entry.title: Custom logic for migrating for migrating information from BP Master Data to Billing Document
entry.content:
Hi,

I am facing a problem in which i need to migrate some informations from Customer Master Data to Balling Docuemnt, si they can be printed in the form template.

My code in custom logic is the following :

DATA LV_ICE TYPE STRING.
"bil_doc_res = bil_doc.
" READ from Importing
SELECT SINGLE TrainStationName
INTO @LV_ice
FROM YY1_ICE_INVOICE
WHERE CUSTOMER = @Bil_DOC-SOLDTOPARTY.
" WRITE to Changing
IF sy-subrc = 0 and bil_doc-YY1_ICE_BDH = ''."IS NOT INITIAL.
bil_doc_res-YY1_ICE_BDH = lv_ice.
ENDIF.

Thank you

entry.title: Payment Advice API - Field Mapping Questions for Payment Reference and Reference Items (F2550)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I'm working with the Manage Payment Advice (F2550) app in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition and have questions about the API field mappings when using the API_PAYMENT_ADVICE_SRV.

Question 1: In the Manage Payment Advice app (F2550), what does the "Payment Reference" field in the header represent? Is it the Accounting Document ID or the Billing Document ID? Please clarify explicitly.

Question 2: In the Manage Payment Advice app (F2550), what does the "Reference" field in the line items represent? Is it the Accounting Document ID or the Billing Document ID? Please clarify explicitly.

Question 3: By populating these fields in the app (F2550), can we establish linkages to related documents that are visible in the document flow?

Question 4: When posting the header "Payment Reference" field via the API (https://api.sap.com/api/API_PAYMENT_ADVICE_SRV/cloud-sdk/ABAP), which specific field in the API payload should be specified?

Question 5: When posting the line item "Reference" field via the API (https://api.sap.com/api/API_PAYMENT_ADVICE_SRV/cloud-sdk/ABAP), which specific field in the API payload should be specified?

I would greatly appreciate if you could answer according to the question numbers above. Direct answers to each numbered question would be most helpful.

Thank you in advance for your support.

entry.title: SAP S4Hana Public Cloud - Custom CDS View - How do I create a view that extends Condition Record
entry.content: I am working on a Custom CDS View that needs general product data such as ID, name, and weight. The tricky part is I also need price level data (such as Condition Table, Customer Group 1 and 2, Condition amount during a specific timeframe). So I believe what I am looking to join are SlsPrcgConditionRecord and either I_SalesOrderItemCube or I_Producttext. What I found is that SlsPrcgConditionRecord does not seem to include a way to extend to either of them. Are there other Views out there that already do this that I Can reference instead?
